Texts.Chs: 我看到你拿到巴哈姆特级执照了。我们现在可以升级你的飞船了。^green;如果你给我 ^orange;32个升级模块^green;我就立即开始升级飞船。
Texts.Eng: I see you got your Bahamut license. ^green;we can upgrade your ship now. If you bring me ^orange;32 upgrade modules ^green;I'll initiate the upgrade.

Texts.Chs: 我看到你拿到秃鹰执照了！ 现在我们可以升级你的飞船了。^green;如果你给我 ^orange;10个升级模块^green;我就立即开始升级飞船。
Texts.Eng: I see you got your Condor license! ^green;Now we can upgrade your ship. If you bring me ^orange;10 upgrade modules ^green;I'll initiate the upgrade procedure.

Texts.Chs: 升级完成了！你终于达到了这艘船的自我升级能力的极限。 如果有什么方法能让一艘船变得比这更好，那么方法就藏在浩瀚星海之中...
Texts.Eng: The upgrade is complete! You've finally reached the limit of this ship's ability to self-upgrade. If there's any way to make a ship finer than this, the knowledge is hidden out there among the stars...

Texts.Chs: 呵呵呵。 ^green;看起来，你的麻烦不仅仅是买卖非法商品...
Texts.Eng: heheheh. ^green;You've got more problems than just trading for illegal goods it seems...
